name: Plato
description:
Plato is a short and slow-paced, point-and-click adventure game about a robot who wants to be a tennis player. He lives in a pseudo-futuristic world where technology has become SO advanced that tennis is obsolete and has been replaced with a far more advanced version of virtual tennis.

While following his dreams, Plato finds himself in the midst of wacky characters and an intriguing mystery.

Illustration, Design & Development by Spenser Coke
Music by Brendon Wheeldon
Plato was made in just a few weeks for the RPG Maker/Humble 2014 Indie Contest.
